hero.title: Our Areas of Intervention
hero.desc: At the heart of N'Djamena and beyond, AAPT works for Peace, Solidarity, Development, and improving the living conditions of the most destitute.

humanitarian.title: Humanitarian and Social Aid
humanitarian.desc: Distribution of food kits, clothing, hygiene products, material support for vulnerable families and individuals.

education.title: Education and Youth Support
education.desc: Distribution of school supplies, awareness in schools, supporting vulnerable children in education.

health.title: Health and Nutrition
health.desc: Awareness campaigns, hospital support, infant nutrition, community hygiene.

training.title: Training
training.desc: Capacity building workshops for youth, women, and local communities.

awareness.title: Awareness and Mobilization
awareness.desc: Organization of conferences, debates, community engagement days.

environment.title: Environment and Community Dev.
environment.desc: Reforestation, sanitation, cleanliness actions, and environmental preservation.

activities.label: Direct Impact
activities.title: Realized Activities
items: Food kit donations to vulnerable families
Visits and donations to orphanages (food, games)

reports.title: Activity Reports
reports.desc: Download our full reports to learn more about our actions and our impact.

items.title: Activity Report 2024
items.desc: Discover the details of our actions on the ground, our impact, and our prospects.

items.title: AAPT Annual Report
items.desc: The full assessment of our humanitarian operations and financial results.

hero.title: News & Events
hero.desc: Discover our actions for equality, our training for youth, and our solidarity initiatives in Chad and Africa.

newsletter.title: Stay Informed of Our Actions
newsletter.desc: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest news on our humanitarian projects and upcoming events directly in your inbox.
newsletter.privacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.

articles.title: 1 Year Serving Humanitarian Action
articles.excerpt: Association Actions Pour Tous celebrates its first year of existence. A year rich in emotions, solidarity, and concrete actions for Chad.

articles.title: Highlights: Community Dinner Sharing
articles.excerpt: Looking back at our grand charity dinner. More than 200 meals distributed in an atmosphere of fraternity and sharing.

articles.title: Sanitation at SOS N'Djari Health Center
articles.excerpt: Our volunteers mobilized for a day of cleaning and disinfection at the health center, ensuring a healthy environment for patients.

articles.title: Awareness Campaign for Peace
articles.excerpt: A series of workshops and meetings to promote dialogue and social cohesion in the neighborhoods of N'Djamena.

articles.title: Support for Orphans: Food Distribution
articles.excerpt: Distribution of food kits and school supplies to support the return to school for orphans sponsored by the association.

articles.title: Activity Report - Launch
articles.excerpt: Publication of our first quarterly activity report. Transparency and commitment are at the heart of our actions.

articles.title: Activity Report 2024
articles.excerpt: Discover the details of our actions on the ground, our impact, and our prospects for the coming year.

articles.title: AAPT Annual Report
articles.excerpt: The full assessment of our humanitarian operations, awareness campaigns, and financial results.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: They share their experience and hope.

items.name: Khadja Daniella
items.content: The transparency and efficiency of AAPT are remarkable. It is a trusted partner for community development in Chad.

items.name: Amina Y.
items.content: Thanks to AAPT, I was able to follow a sewing training and launch my small business. Today, I am independent and can support my family.

items.name: Moussa K.
items.content: Being a volunteer at AAPT allowed me to see the impact of our actions directly. The smiles of children during distributions are my greatest reward.

hero.title: Contact AAPT
hero.desc: We are here to answer any questions, discuss partnerships, or provide assistance. Together, let's act for everyone.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.desc: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
form.name: Your Name

map.title: Find Us
map.desc: Our office is located at Ndjari/ECRB, accessible to everyone.

hero.title: Your generosity is <0>their future.</0>
hero.desc: Every donation counts. By supporting AAPT, you directly contribute to children's education, medical care for families, and women's empowerment in Chad.

impact.title: What will your donation do?
impact.desc: We ensure that every franc donated is used optimally for our projects on the ground.

cards.title: Complete School Kit
cards.desc: Provides a bag, notebooks, pens, and textbooks to a child for the entire school year.

cards.title: Medical Care
cards.desc: Covers consultation fees and basic medicines for a mother and her child.

cards.title: Youth Training
cards.desc: Funds a complete professional training module at the Horizon Center for a young person.

cta.title: Join the Movement
cta.desc: Every gesture counts. Whether through a donation, volunteering, or simply sharing our message, you help Chad move forward.

hero.title: Immersion in our actions
hero.desc: Explore the impact of our projects on the ground through images and videos. Smiles, hope, and real change.

gallery.empty: No items found in this category.

cta.title: These images testify to your impact
cta.desc: Every action taken is made possible thanks to the generosity of our donors. Join us to continue writing this story.

hero.title: Peace, Solidarity, Development
hero.desc: Non-profit, secular, and apolitical organization. Founded in 2023, Association Actions Pour Tous works for human solidarity, social justice, and sustainable development.

pillars.label: Our Foundations
pillars.title: Our Pillars of Action
pillars.desc: AAPT is committed daily through concrete actions to support populations and build a fairer society.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: Actively contributing to improving the living conditions of vulnerable people through concrete actions in social solidarity, health, education, training, child protection, and community development.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: Building a fairer, more inclusive, and supportive Chadian society where every person, especially the most disadvantaged, can live with dignity, access education and health, and actively participate in their community development.

about.quote: Acting together so that <0>no one</0> is left behind.

team.label: Our Strength
team.title: Our Team
team.desc: Passionate individuals committed to building a better future in Chad.

president.bio: Visionary and committed, he guides AAPT with the conviction that every action counts for a united and supportive Chad.

1.title: Official Creation
1.desc: Launch of Association Actions Pour Tous (AAPT) in N'Djamena with the main mission to promote social cohesion and living together.

2.title: Field Actions
2.desc: Multiplication of initiatives: community dinners for brotherhood, sanitation campaigns (SOS N'Djari), and help for vulnerable people.

missions.title: Our Priority Missions
missions.subtitle: We are committed on the ground to promoting equality, protecting the most vulnerable, and training tomorrow's leaders.

women.title: Women's Rights
women.desc: Active fight against gender-based violence and promotion of Chadian women's empowerment.

youth.title: Youth & Training
youth.desc: Organizing training and exchanges with partners like 'Centre Horizon' for the future of youth.

solidarity.title: Solidarity
solidarity.desc: Concrete humanitarian actions: food distribution, health campaigns, and support for orphans.

1.title: 1 Year of Humanitarian Action
1.desc: Association Actions Pour Tous celebrates its first year. A year rich in emotions and concrete actions.

2.title: Community Dinner Sharing
2.desc: Looking back at our charity dinner. Over 200 meals distributed in an atmosphere of brotherhood.

3.title: Health Center Sanitation
3.desc: Our volunteers mobilized for a day of cleaning and disinfection at the SOS N'Djari health center.

cta.title: Join the Solidarity Movement
cta.subtitle: Under the leadership of Abakar Saleh Mahamat, we are building a fairer future. Your support makes a difference for the women and youth of Chad.

footer.newsletterDesc: Receive the latest news about our humanitarian actions.
